column4: Hey all. I just uninstalled proftpd but it says it is started from inetd, and the server is still running, how do i shut off the server, and if i leave it installed, how do i prevent it from loading at boot time
try 'update-rc.d -f proftpd remove' at the command line to remove all startup links for proftpd
'man update-rc.d' to see info on the command
i knew a chic who was into that greek stuff
alright, thx...ill try that in a minute
